abstract: Experts cite multiple rookie errors in lethal kayaking trip undertaken by Angelika Graswald and her fiance Vincent Viafore; Graswald stands accused of intentionally causing Viafore's death during trip, but experts say mistakes, including lack of life preserver, might well have led to tragedy regardless.
lead_paragraph: Paddling authorities say Angelika Graswald and Vincent Viafore made rookie errors, chief among them that Mr. Viafore, who vanished when his boat capsized in the cold river, did not have a life jacket.

headline.main: Couple’s Kayak Trip on Hudson Included Mistakes, Experts Say
headline.print_headline: Kayak Excursion Linked to Murder Was Full of Errors, Paddling Experts Say

snippet: Paddling authorities say Angelika Graswald and Vincent Viafore made rookie errors, chief among them that Mr. Viafore, who vanished when his boat capsized in the cold river, did not have a life jacket.
